Module NullDrv

Include #include "NullRHI.h"

Syntax

class FNullDynamicRHI :  
    public FDynamicRHIPSOFallback ,  
    public IRHICommandContextPSOFallback

Remarks

A null implementation of the dynamically bound RHI.
